column16: Erysimum repandum is a ANNUAL growing to 0.6 m (2ft).  See above for USDA hardiness. It is hardy to UK zone 6.  It is in flower from May to June. The species is hermaphrodite (has both male and female organs).  Suitable for: light (sandy), medium (loamy) and heavy (clay) soils, prefers  well-drained soil and can grow in nutritionally poor soil. Suitable pH: neutral and basic (mildly alkaline) soils. It cannot grow in the shade. It prefers dry or  moist soil.
